name: ant hill

exits.description: To the north a smaller hill is visible, with buildings towering high above it in the distance.
You can not head this direction.
To the East is a mysterious sight.  It is as if a hallway is there one moment, and gone the next, leaving behind only a sea of grass.  It seems to be flickering in and out of existence.
You can not head this direction.
You can not go this direction.
You can not head this direction.
You can not head this direction.
You can not head this direction.
You see the clear blue sky and the sun. You can not head this direction.
Looking into the crevice, you realize this is a deserted ant hill, and the crevice is its entrance.

description: The anthill has clearly been deserted for awhile, with no ant tracks visible in the sand  The entrance yawns below you, leaving much to the imagination about what may be lying in wait.  To the East is a perfectly normal hallway.  Or, wait, there was a perfectly normal hallway.  Now all that appears is an ocean of grass.  Down the path to the north lies a smaller hill.
